definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: The school canteen provides hamburgers, sandwiches, pizza and so on.
sentences.chinese: 學校食堂提供漢堡，三明治，比薩餅等等。

sentences.english: Many students swarm into the canteen after class.
sentences.chinese: 放學後，很多學生擁進食堂。

sentences.english: In the cafeteria at Liu's training base, the hurdler has his own dining table.
sentences.chinese: 在訓練基地的食堂裏，劉翔擁有自己的專座。

sentences.english: Double-time the troops to the mess hall.
sentences.chinese: 命令部隊快步向部隊食堂行進。

sentences.english: Seven 40-foot containers are occupied by a cafeteria and services.
sentences.chinese: 食堂和其他服務設施則由七個40英尺的集裝箱組成。

sentences.english: View from the window of my new dorm.
sentences.chinese: 窗外，新宿舍，慶北大學食堂。

sentences.english: Originally, collect in temple to administer the fragrant light of dining room.
sentences.chinese: 起初，拾得在寺內掌管食堂香燈。

sentences.english: Dormitory parents and cafeteria workers receive paychecks from the school.
sentences.chinese: 宿舍的舍長和自助食堂的工人從學校領到了工資。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought snacks or drinks in the Convenience Store of Orchid Canteen?
sentences.chinese: 您曾到過蘭苑食堂的便利店買零食或者飲料嗎？

sentences.english: Meals are only provided with voucher payment.
sentences.chinese: 憑用餐代金券在太陽村食堂就餐。

sentences.english: According to Soviet concept healthiness was the key point of catering.
sentences.chinese: 按照蘇維埃的理念，食堂的核心是保證健康。

sentences.english: Non-refrigerated, "small" cups, and in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 非冷藏，小杯子，可在食堂和。

sentences.english: Poisoning places to factory canteens oriented.
sentences.chinese: 中毒場所以工廠食堂爲主。

sentences.english: E. g. Subsidised canteen is one of staff benefits.
sentences.chinese: 由公司補貼的職工食堂是員工福利之一。

sentences.english: To restore their canteen, the workers move back to work, arrange appropriate work.
sentences.chinese: 恢復職工食堂，把工人招回上班，安排適當工作。

sentences.english: Go past the building and you will see our lab building.
sentences.chinese: 走過食堂，你就會見到我們的實驗樓。

definition: to get food at a canteen
kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
